description:
If you've been hearing a lot about 'LNG' in the media recently, this is why.
Also, check out the entire video right here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K2oL4SFwkkw
BIG thanks to Canary Media (canarymedia.com/subscribe-to-our-newsletter) and Climate Power (climatepower.us) for their support, research, and reporting. 

And if you're looking for some more WILD info about methane, check out our friends over at @HotAndToxic for some truly insane information about the many delightful toxins that gas has to offer: https://hotandtoxic.com/#facts
title: America's Horrible Gas Problem
